actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with regard to the rollover or multiyear distributions from a qualified pension plan.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit distributions from a tax-qualified deferred compensation plan which are made after the close of the taxable year but before the tax return filing date to be treated as being made on the last day of such taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with regard to the rollover or multiyear distributions from a qualified pension plan.
